title: Can I have a rioter play with me for my 1000 win
body: Just about to get my 1000 win any chance I can get a rioter to play with me ^_^

replies.body: Add me in game i'll play :)

Can i play too?

(If it's norms) ( ; ---.--- )
bumping to make sure it gets through to Rito :)

I'll upvote you mate, I want something similar for mine.

I'd choose Voyboy or Dunkey (Even though he's not a pro). =P
